title: Pediatric Emergency Response Training Using Technology-Enhanced Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of Foundational Medical Knowledge and Pediatric Patient Care Experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized instructional design for working learners, providing smartphone-based simulation content for non-PC environments

learning_goals: In a simulation environment, learners can accurately identify severe pediatric emergencies (e.g., respiratory distress, shock) within 5 minutes and perform initial response procedures
Using Technology-Enhanced Simulation (TES) modules, learners can evaluate core symptoms in pediatric patient diagnosis with over 90% accuracy
After simulation learning, over 85% of learners demonstrate improved time management skills in actual clinical settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
